title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

Every 1993 and later model year motor vehicle sold in New

York State shall be equipped with a tamper resistant odometer which meets the
standards set forth in this Part. Odometers are required on the following
vehicles, but such vehicles need not meet the tamper resistant standards set
forth in this Part: a motorcycle, a tractor, a truck with a gross vehicle
weight rating over 18,000 pounds, a low sped vehicle, or a bus which seats 22
or more adults plus the driver. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
60.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
